newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Rates drop on Mississippi.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Rates drop on Mississippi.

text.p: U.S. barge rates dropped about 10 percentage points on Mississippi River barges for April positions on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session, the Exchange said.
No barges traded versus none Monday.
- One barge, this week, Missouri, this week, bid 110 percent of tariff - unchanged from similar bid, no offer.
- Four barges, one each week of April, mid Mississippi, bid 130 percent - down 10 percentage points, offered 140 - no comparison.
- Two barges, one each this week and next week, mid-Mississippi, bid 132-1/2 percent - down 10 points, no offer.
- Two barges, one each week of April 6 and 13, upper Mississippi (LaCrosse-Savage), bid 160 percent - no comparison, no offer.
- Four barges, one each week of October, mid-Mississippi, bid 230 percent, offered 245 percent - no comparison on either value.
